Author: Royal_Flu$h
Description: Enter the code while keeping track of the resets. Use the number of resets to calculate the disarm code. Tags: flip-timer, prompt, text-entry, execute, random-letters, black-on-white, white-on-black
Name: The Swan

TwitchPlays.ScoreExplanation: The swan awards 1 point per successful reset, and awards 3 additional points upon solving the module.
